name: Wacky Ship
description:
You're navigating your spaceship battling against waves of enemies  and you gradually lose control of your ship whenever it gets damaged.

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020

https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2020

Everything was made during the 48 hours jam including music and art.

Versions for Windows and macos just download and play!

Controls:

  • move with WASD or arrow keys
  • shoot with space bar

Development Team:

@felipeViana - programming and music

@vrauzito - art

source code: https://github.com/felipeViana/wacky_ship

made with Löve 2d version 11.3  https://love2d.org/

SFX made with Bfxr https://www.bfxr.net/

Music made with BeepBox https://beepbox.co

Art made with Pixilart https://www.pixilart.com/
